name: Yellow Game
description:
Are you ready for this new yellow bouncing adventure? How quick are you when it comes to accuracy and reflexes? Tap to bounce on tiles and move further. Every time you bounce, the tile gets yellow and scores you a point. As you progress further, the harder and challenging it gets but at the same time more fun to play. Unlock new trails while playing.

Are you ready to be the part of this elegant yellow bouncing adventure?
Download right now and have fun

How to play
• Tap to bounce
• Bounce to score points
